name: ReadOps
tagline: A virtual bookclub for people interested in ops
body: Welcome to ReadOps! We're starting with [In Search of Certainty](http://www.amazon.com/Search-Certainty-Science-Information-Infrastructure-ebook/dp/B00ENEEWYO/ref=sr_1_1?s=books&ie=UTF8&qid=1398782586&sr=1-1&keywords=in+search+of+certainty) by Mark Burgess. Tweet [@bscofield](https://twitter.com/bscofield) if you want more details
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
